trans-unit.source: Holds a table of statements that is offered by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含由所提供的陳述式的資料表<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the table contains the given statement owner.
trans-unit.target: 判斷資料表是否包含指定的陳述式擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The owner of the statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式集合的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: if statementOwner is in the table; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 statementOwner 在資料表中; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: statementOwner is .
trans-unit.target: statementOwneris .

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>如<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the statement collection for the given owner.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的擁有者的陳述式集合。

trans-unit.source: The owner of the statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式集合的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The statement collection for statementOwner, or if statementOwner is not in the table.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式集合 statementOwner ，或如果 statementOwner 不是資料表中。

trans-unit.source: statementOwner is .
trans-unit.target: statementOwneris .

trans-unit.source: Populates the statement table with a collection of statement owners.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式使用擴展資料表陳述式擁有者的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you are the creator of the statement context, you should call the Populate method if you want statement tables to be used to store values for certain objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在陳述式內容的建立者，您應該呼叫方法，如果您想要用來將值儲存在特定的陳述式資料表物件填入。

trans-unit.source: A collection of statement owners to add to the table.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式加入至資料表的擁有者的集合。

trans-unit.source: statementOwner is .
trans-unit.target: statementOwneris .

trans-unit.source: Populates the statement table with a statement owner.
trans-unit.target: 陳述式擁有者陳述式資料表中填入。

trans-unit.source: If you are the creator of the statement context, you should call the Populate method if you want statement tables to be used to store values for certain objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在陳述式內容的建立者，您應該呼叫方法，如果您想要用來將值儲存在特定的陳述式資料表物件填入。

trans-unit.source: The statement owner to add to the table.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入表格的陳述式擁有者。

trans-unit.source: owner is .
trans-unit.target: owneris .

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，可用來逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>
